chinese: 彼候人兮、何戈與祋。彼其之子、三百赤芾。
english: Those officers of escort,Have their carriers of lances and halberds.But these creatures,With their three hundred red covers for the knees! -

chinese: 維鵜在梁、不濡其翼。彼其之子、不稱其服。
english: The pelican is on the dam,And will not wet his wings!These creatures,Are not equal to their dress!

chinese: 維鵜在梁、不濡其咮。彼其之子、不遂其媾。
english: The pelican is on the dam,And will not wet his beak!These creatures,Do not respond to the favour they enjoy.

chinese: 薈兮蔚兮、南山朝隮。婉兮孌兮、季女斯飢。
english: Extensive and luxuriant is the vegetation,And up the south hill in the morning rise the vapours.Tender is she and lovely,But the young lady is suffering from hunger.
